author: jvanzyl
msg: Changing all the init sequences to use the jars.list because there's
a task that will deal with this. I see a better way of doing this
but for now it keeps our dependencies in a single spot.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Getting rid of init.properties reference. Caught by the bootstrap test.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Change the bootstrap to include the jars.list in the distribution so
that it can be used to build the classpath.
Made a clean-bootstrap target that will backup your maven.home and
lib.repo and then do the bootstrap. This should be used in
conjunction with a clean checkout when changing anything
Runtime tests should be added too and I will work on this

author: jvanzyl
msg: Using jars.list for creating the maven-classpath.
